snippet: Bill de Blasio and Christine C. Quinn argued over whether Mr. de Blasio’s wife had suggested that Ms. Quinn could not understand the problems of parents because she did not have children.
abstract: Trailside blog; Bill de Blasio and Christine C Quinn, Democratic front-runners in race for New York City mayor, get into ugly dispute over whether de Blasio's wife Chirlane McCray suggested that Quinn could not understand problems of parents because she does not have children herself; de Blasio campaign says McCray's comments were initially quoted incorrectly and were not inappropriate when taken in context.
lead_paragraph: Bill de Blasio and Christine C. Quinn argued over whether Mr. de Blasio’s wife had suggested that Ms. Quinn could not understand the problems of parents because she did not have children.

headline.main: Comments by de Blasio’s Wife Lead to Dispute With Quinn
headline.print_headline:
Quinn Blasts Comments
Made by de Blasio’s Wife
